Registration

Authorization

Login Value: {{login}}

{{token}}

{{login}}

{{password}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-authorization', templateUrl: './authorization.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authorization.component.css'] }) export class AuthorizationComponent implements OnInit { public isRegirtrated : boolean = true; token: string = ""; userName: string = 'ivan'; login: string = 'rab@gmail.com'; password: string = '1234'; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} changeState(){ this.isRegirtrated = !this.isRegirtrated; } signIn(): void { this.cookingService.userSignIn(this.login, this.password).subscribe(token => this.cookingService.token = token); this.token = this.cookingService.token; } signUp(): void { this.cookingService.userSignUp(this.userName, this.login, this.password).subscribe(); } ngOnInit() : void { } }
